loans.name: Constancia

texts.en: Constancia is married with three children. She is 53 years-old and lives in Antonino, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. Constancia sells snacks to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. She has requested a loan to purchase food to cook her snacks to sell/retail. Constancia has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Constancia hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase food for snacks to cook to sell/retail.

location.town: Liloy - Antonino, Labason, Zamboanga Del Norte

loans.name: Churoloma Group

texts.es:
Churoloma es una sociedad de tres personas que buscan mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familias, de este grupo se destaca Gloria por ser una persona responsable, trabajadora y con deseos de superación. Gloria vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en Salcedo muy cerca de latacunga.

Gloria trabaja con su esposo en la crianza de ganado para venta, actualmente les va muy bien en su negocio ya que tienen buena clientela, ahora por incrementar su negocio solicitan un crédito a Fodemi el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de una vaca lechera para entrar en el negocio de producción y venta de leche y queso, negocio que les ayudará a obtener más clientes, mejores ventas y un incremento en los ingresos lo que ayudará a mejorar su calidad de vida.

Gloria sueña en tener una producción grande de leche para poder ser una distribuidora y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en: Churoloma is a group of three people who want to improve the quality of life for their families. One of the members is Gloria, a responsible, hardworking woman with a strong desire to move up in life. She lives with her husband and their two children in Salcedo, very close to the city of Latacunga. Gloria works with her husband raising livestock to sell, and currently the business is going very well because they have a good customer base. Now, in order to grow the business she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner FODEMI, which she plans to use to purchase a milk-cow to enter into the business of producing milk and cheese. This business with help her and her husband attract more customers, grow their sales and increase their income, thus improving their quality of life. Gloria dreams of becoming a big milk producer and distributor, and improving the quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to purchase a milk-cow for the production of milk and cheese.

loans.name: Jazhem

texts.en:
This is Jazhem; he previously accessed an PHP 9,000 loan that he utilized to buy more quantities of fish ball products and other ingredients needed for his business. His earnings were a big help for the education of his child and in their personal household and business expenditures. 

He would like to apply for another PHP 11,000 loan.  He will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities of fish ball products and other ingredients. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. The profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain their daily needs and educational expenses of his child. He looks forward to this financial increase with happiness and gratitude in his heart.

Jazhem hopes to be able to expand soon, just as he fervently hopes to give his family a good future. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional fish ball products and other ingredients needed for his business.

loans.name: Joefrey

texts.en:
This is Joefrey; he previously accessed a PHP 10,000 loan that he utilized to buy fish ball products and other ingredients needed in his business. His earnings were a big help for the education of his children and in their personal household and business expenditures. 

He would like to apply for another PHP 12,000 loan. He will be utilizing the loan to buy fish ball products and other ingredients. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result for better profit. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain their daily needs and educational expenses of his children. He looks forward to this financial increase with happiness and gratitude in his heart.

Joefrey hopes to be able to expand soon and dreams to give his children a good and quality education. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stock of fish ball products and other ingredients.

loans.name: Mahukpehu Group

texts.fr: MAHUKPEHU est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, Marie (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 49 ans. Marie est mariée à un certain Émile et a six enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Marie vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Marie n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Marie vend depuis une dizaine d’année, des mèches et des vêtements à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Marie vend des cartes de recharge téléphonique. Marie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d’augmenter son fonds de roulement et de renforcer son activité, Marie sollicite un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUKPEHU. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en:
Mahukpehu is a group of 3 people who all live in the same area of Benin. The representative of the group, Marie (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 49 years old. She is married to a certain Emile, and they have 6 children, all of whom go to school and are under their care. Marie lives together with her husband and children. Together the couple takes care of the various household expenses. Marie did not go to school.

To meet her different expenses, Marie has been selling hair extensions and clothes from her home for about 10 years. Additionally, Marie sells telephone recharge cards. She procures her goods from a market in Benin. 

In the search for customer satisfaction and to see an increase in her business and working capital, Marie is asking for a fourth loan from Alidé together with the other members of the Mahukpehu group. This loan will help them better respond to customer requests and earn more profits.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and telephone recharge cards

loans.name: La Joie Group

texts.fr: Le groupe LA JOIE est formé de trois personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Victoire, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Victoire est âgée de 24 ans . Victoire est mariée à un certain Jean-Mari et a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à la charge du couple.  Victoire vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Victoire a arrêté l'école au niveau secondaire. Pour  subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants, Victoire vend des bijoux, des colliers et des plateaux d’œufs frais à son domicile depuis environs huit ans. Victoire s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le souci de renforcer davantage son activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Victoire désire augmenter le stock de ses produits. Pour ce faire, Victoire sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe LA JOIE, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The "La Joie" group is made up of 3 people who live in the same area. The group's representative, Victoire, is the one with her hand raised in the picture. This is the second time that this group requests financial support from ALIDé in order to raise their business levels.

Victoire is 24 years old. She is married to Jean-Mari and has 3 dependent children, who all go to school. Victoire lives together with her children and husband. She left school at secondary level. In order to be able to meet her children's needs, Victoire has been selling jewellery, necklaces and trays of fresh eggs from her home for around 8 years. She gets her supplies in a market in Benin. 

Victoire wishes to increase her inventory of products, with a view to further strengthening her business and better responding to her customers' demands. In order to do this, Victoire is requesting a second loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of "La Joie".

loans.use: to buy jewellery, necklaces and trays of fresh eggs.

loans.name: Fifonsi Group

texts.fr: Le groupe FIFONSI est formé de trois  personnes qui habitent dans le même village. La représentante  de ce groupe, nommée Assiba Clémence, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Assiba Clémence est âgée de 54 ans et est mariée à un certain Maurice. Le couple a six enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Assiba Clémence vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Assiba Clémence assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges du ménage. Assiba Clémence n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Il y a environs six ans que Assiba Clémence exerce comme activité, la vente de friperies à son domicile, mais aussi de façon ambulante ; ce qui lui permet de répondre sans grande difficulté aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Dans le souci de renforcer davantage son activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Assiba Clémence désire augmenter le stock de ses produits. Pour ce faire, Assiba Clémence sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FIFONSI, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les trois premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Fifonsi group is made up of 3 people who live in the same village. The group's representative, Assiba Clémence, is the one with her hand raised in the picture. This is the fourth time that this group requests financial support from ALIDé in order to raise their business levels.

Assiba Clémence is 54 years old. She is married to Maurice and has 6 dependent children, who all go to school. Assiba Clémence lives together with her children and husband. She and her husband both take care of the various household expenses. Assiba Clémence did not go to school. She has been selling second-hand clothing from her home and on the street for around 6 years; this enables her to respond to her children's needs without too much difficulty, and to meet her own.

Assiba Clémence wishes to increase her inventory of products, with a view to further strengthening her business and better responding to her customers' demands. In order to do this, Assiba Clémence is requesting a 4th loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of Fifonsi. The first 3 loans her been properly repaid.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Titonangba Group

texts.fr: Le groupe TITONANGBA est formé de deux personnes qui habitent dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Rafatou, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Rafatou est âgée de 60 ans. Rafatou est une veuve et mère de cinq enfants non scolarisés. Aucun des enfants n'est plus à la charge de Rafatou. Rafatou vit seule et assure seule ses différents besoins. Rafatou n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour  subvenir à ses besoins, Rafatou vend des emballages de "pure water" à son domicile depuis une trentaine d'année. Rafatou s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le souci de renforcer davantage son activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Rafatou désire augmenter le stock de ses produits. Pour ce faire, Rafatou sollicite ensemble avec le second membre du groupe TITONANGBA, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: The Titonangba group is made up of two people who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of this group, whose name is Rafatou, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. It is the third time that this group has requested financial aid from Alidé, with a view to increasing their business volume. Rafatou is 60 years old, a widow and mother to five children who have not been educated. None of the children are any longer supported by Rafatou. She lives alone and provides for her own needs. Rafatou did not go to school and, in order to provide for needs, has been selling packages of "pure water" from her home for the past 30 years or so. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. In order to boost her business and respond better to customer demand, Rafatou wants to increase her stock. To do this she is, together with the second member of the Titonangba group, requesting a third loan from Alidé.

loans.use: to buy packages of "pure water".

loans.name: Gbenonkpo Sourou Group

texts.fr: GBENONKPO SOUROU est un groupe de cinq personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même  quartier. La représentante du groupe, Sahawath (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 38 ans et est mariée à un chauffeur nommé Aziz. Le couple a trois enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Sahawath vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Sahawath n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Depuis une vingtaine d'année, Sahawath mène comme activité la vente de savons et des boissons en cannettes dans un marché du Bénin. Sahawath dans des régions du Bénin. C’est la sixième fois que Sahawath et les autres membres du groupe GBENONKPO SOUROU sollicitent l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur fonds de roulement et leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle. Les crédits précédemment reçus ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Gbenonkpo Sourou is a group of 5 people who all live in the same area. The representative of the group, Sahawath (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 38 years old and is married to a driver named Aziz. The couple has 3 children, all still under their care. Some of the children have been to school. Sahawath lives together with her husband and children. Together the couple takes care of the different household expenses. Sahawath did not go to school.

For about 20 years, Sahawath has been selling soap and canned drinks in a market in Benin.

This is the sixth time that Sahawath and the other members of the Gbenonkpo Sourou group are asking for financial support from Alidé to increase their business and working capital and to better respond to the demands of their customers. Their previous loans have all been repaid.

loans.use: to buy cartons of soaps and canned drinks

loans.name: Les Anges De Meran 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 Group

texts.fr:
Rosynsky est la coordonatrice de son groupe Les Anges de Meran. Elle est Celibataire et elle n'a pas enfants.  Rosynsky habite dans la région de  Ferrier d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limité.

Rosynsky a dirigé son  commerce de produits divers pendant les 5  dernières années.  Avant de commencer ce commerce, elle  etait a l'ecole. Elle voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir avec duit du Vetement. 

Rosynsky  espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business. Des autres membres  trinite  ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme charbon, cosmetique et  chaussures. Rosynsky  dit que ses défis principal est de un grand commercant.
texts.en:
Rosynsky is the coordinator of the group "Les Anges de Meran". She is single and has no children. Rosynsky lives in the Ferrier region of Haiti, where electricity is rare and water is very limited. Rosynsky has been running a business selling various products for the past 5 years. Before starting this business, she was at school. She would like to use this loan to invest in clothing.

Rosynsky hopes that this loan will help her to expand her business. The other members of the group need a loan for their businesses selling things like charcoal, cosmetics and shoes. Rosynsky says that her main challenge is to become a big businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Jessy Carolina

texts.es:
Jessy, es una joven de 28 años , casada, madre de tres hijos , ama de casa, tiene su pulpería negocio con el cual ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Antes vendía ropa de manera ambulante para al quedar embarazada por tercera vez, no tenía quien le cuidara a sus hijos así que decidió poner un negocio que le permitiera estar más cerca de sus hijos y la pulpería fue la mejor opción para ella además de eso vende tortilla.
Está requiriendo un crédito para comprar maíz, aceite, huevo, leche, pollo, carne, azúcar, frijoles, detergentes, jabones. Todos productos de mucha necesidad en su clientela. En lo futuro desea ampliar a un espacio más grande su pulpería y surtirlo con más productos.
texts.en:
Jessy is a 28 year old woman. She is married and the mother of three children. She is a housewife and has a small grocery store as a business. With it she helps her husband with the household expenses. She used to sell clothes as a street vendor but when she became pregnant for the third time she didn't have anyone to take care of her children so she decided to open a business that would allow her to be nearer her children. The store was the best option for her. She also sells tortillas.

She needs a loan to buy corn, oil, milk, chicken, meat, sugar, beans, detergents and soap. All of these products are much needed by her customers. In the future, she wants to expand the space for her store and stock it with more products.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, eggs, milk, chicken, meat, sugar, beans, detergents and soap.

loans.name: Carla Patricia

texts.es: Carla, de oficio comerciante, habitante de la ciudad de León. Está muy agradecida por haberle permitido obtener su primera experiencia crediticia la cual fue de mucho provecho para su vida logro comprar productos lácteos, gaseosas para vender. Ahora con la meta de ir surtiendo más su pulpería está solicitando este crédito para comprar productos de los cuales carecen tales como granos básicos, aceite, productos de limpieza, cosméticos. Pues su idea es ir mejorando y surtiendo con más productos su negocio para darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en: Carla is a merchant by trade. She lives in the city of León. She is very grateful for having been allowed to have her first loan experience, which was very useful for her life. She was able to buy dairy products and soft drinks to sell. Now her goal is to stock her store more and she is asking for this loan to buy products she lacks such as basic grains, oil, cleaning products and cosmetics. Her idea is to improve and stock her business with more products to give her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, oil, cleaning products and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jiguiya Group

texts.fr:
Les sept membres du groupe JIGUIYA sont essentiellement de femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 42  ans, et  en moyenne 5 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles polygamiques à KADIOLO KOKO,  un des cercles de Sikasso. 
Elles sont à leur vingt et unième prêt avec la dite institution de micro finance et tous les prêts précédents ont été correctement remboursés.
ALIMA  assise avec une écharpe rouge sur la photo, mène l’activité achat et  de vente d’habits il y'a environ 20 ans. Elle s’approvisionne à SIKASSO et souvent à R.C.I pays frontalier du Mali puis les revend à Kadiolo et ses environnants au comptant et à crédit à clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Les ventes s'effectuent au marché et à domicile.
Elle compte acheter 3 douzaines de vêtements pour enfants.
Elle réalise un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50 000 FCFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son intérêt et l’autre pour son épargne .
texts.en:
The 7 members of the Jiguiya group are mainly married women with an average age of 42 and, on average, 5 children. They primarily live in polygamous family settings in Kadiolo Koko, one of the circles of Sikasso. They are on their 21st loan with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution and their previous loans have been properly repaid.

Alima, sitting with a red scarf in the picture, has been buying and selling clothing for around 20 years. She gets her supplies in Sikasso and often in the Ivory Coast, a country bordering Mali, before reselling them in Kadiolo and the surrounding area, for cash or credit to a clientèle composed of men and women. She makes her sales at the market and door-to-door. She plans to buy 3 dozen items of children's clothing. She makes an average monthly profit of 50 000 francs, part of which is used to repay her loan and interest, whilst the rest is used to build up her savings.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Salicou

texts.fr:
Monsieur SALICOU est né vers 1985 à DIOUMANTENE cercle de KADIOLO. Célibataire sans enfants il vit dans une famille traditionnelle à Dioulasso - Kadiolo (troisième région administrtive de la république du Mali).
 Il possède un kiosque afin de bien mener son activité de commerce. Afin de   satisfaire sa clientèle en nette croissance, il collabore avec l’Institution de Micro Finance Soro Yiriwaso depuis 1 an.  Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien  remboursés.
Ce prêt lui permettra d’acheter, 10 téléphoniques, des cartons de façades et des cartons de recharges prépayées. Il s’approvisionne à Bamako et revend au comptant, en détail dans sa boutique à Kadiolo et souvent à Zégoua à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, il envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 100 000 FCFA. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer les intérêts de son prêt de résoudre l’essentielle de ses dépenses et investir le reste dans son activité.
Il compte augmenter son capital pour aménager un endroit beaucoup plus accueillant afin de satisfaire sa clientèle.
texts.en:
SALICOU was born around 1985 in DIOUMANTENE, Kadiolo Cercle. He is single with no children, and he lives in a traditional family in Dioulasso - Kadiolo (third largest administrative region in the Republic of Mali).

He has a kiosk where he conducts his business. He has been working with the micro-finance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, for one year now in order to satisfy his growing customer base. His previous loans were correctly repaid.

This loan will allow him to buy 10 cellphones, some boxes of cellphone covers, and prepaid calling cards. He stocks up in Bamako and resells his goods retail for cash at his boutique in Kadiolo, and often in Zégoua as well, to a clientele of both men and women.

With the loan, he plans to earn an average monthly profit of 100,000 FCFA. The profit will allow him to pay the interest of his loan and cover his expenses. He will reinvest the rest in his business.

His plan is to increase his capital to make his kiosk more welcoming in order to satisfy his customers.

loans.use: to buy cellphones and accessories

loans.name: Fatogoma

texts.fr:
Monsieur FATOGOMA est né vers 1980 à KADIOLO cercle de KADIOLO. Père de 5 enfants il vit dans une famille traditionnelle à Noumousso - KADIOLO (troisième région administrtive de la république du Mali).
Depuis maintenant près de 5 ans, il possède sa boutique de vente d'articles de quincaillerie. Cette riche expérience dans le domaine, lui a valu une bonne réputation et il reçoit beaucoup de commandes .Afin de satisfaire sa clientèle, il collabore avec l’Institution de Micro finance Soro Yiriwaso depuis 2 ans.  Les prêts antérieurs ont été bien  remboursés.
Ce prêt lui permettra d’acheter, des matériels de quincaillerie: des cartons d’ampoules, d'interrupteurs, de peintures et des rouleaux de fil électriques. Il s’approvisionne à Bamako capitale du Mali. Il les revend au comptant et en détail dans sa boutique à Kadiolo à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, il envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 150 000 FCFA. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer les intérêts de son prêt de résoudre l’essentielle de ses dépenses et investir le reste dans son activité.
Il compte devenir un grossiste pour servir sa clientèle qui ne cesse d’augmenter  de jour en jour.
texts.en:
Fatogoma was born around 1980 in Kadiolo, Kadiolo Circle. The father of 5 children, he lives in a traditional family setting in Noumousso, Kadiolo (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). For almost five year now, he has owned a hardware store. This rich experience in his line of work has earned him a good reputation and he gets many orders. In order to satisfy his customers, he has been working with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution for 2 years. The previous loans have been properly repaid.

This loan will enable him to buy hardware items; boxes of bulbs, interrupters, paint and rolls of electric wire. He gets his supplies in Bamako, the capital of Mali. He resells them for cash in his Kadiolo shop to a retail clientèle made up of men and women. With the help of this loan, he expects to make an average monthly profit of 150 000 francs. This profit will allow him to make the interest payments on his loan and will cover most of his expenditures, and the rest will be reinvested in his business. He plans to become a wholesaler so that he can serve his clientèle, which grows each day.

loans.use: to buy hardware items.

loans.name: Lidiya

texts.ru:
Лидия просит предоставить ей 5000 грн на покупку осенней женской одежды - костюмы и пижамы турецкого производства, которые пользуются хорошим спросом в этот период.

Предыдущий кредит использовала на новый товар для ее расширившего места. Соседка по бизнесу на рынке вышла замуж и закрыла свой бизнес, продав Лидии свое место. Теперь у нее в два раза шире и больше торговый киоск. 

Лидия помогает дочери воспитывать дочку, приобрела ей одежду для школы и теплое зимнее пальто.
texts.en: Lidiya is asking for a loan of 5000 griven to purchase fall women's clothing - suits and pajamas from Turkey, which are popular with the clients during this season. Her last loan was used to purchase new inventory for her expanded retail space. The store next to her closed since the owner married and Lidya purchased the retail space from her. Now she has a store twice as large. Lidiya helps her daughter raise her little girl and bought her clothes for school and a warm winter coat.

loans.use: to purchase fall women's clothing

loans.name: Doljinhand

texts.en:
Mrs.Doljinhand is 24 years old and lives with her husband, 2 daughters and grandmother in Ger in the Arkhangai province of Mongolia. She is a calm and hardworking woman. Her husband works at the Arkhangai branch of MCS Group. 

She has rented a small cafe for years. She is planning to open a grocery store near her house. She has estimated the profit and expects it would be enough to cover her family expenses and additional business expenses. In the future, she is planning to wholesale greater amounts of various foods. 

She is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy raw materials, equipment and tools to start her own grocery store.

loans.use: To buy raw materials, equipment and tools to start her own grocery store

loans.name: Ognatan Group

texts.fr: Le groupe OGNATAN est formé de deux personnes qui sont des amies. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Marie Parfaite, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Marie Parfaite est âgée de 54 ans et ne vit plus avec son mari. Marie Parfaite a deux enfants, dont un est scolarisé et tous à sa charge. Marie Parfaite vit seule avec ses enfants et assure seule ses besoins. Marie Parfaite n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Il y a environs quinze ans que Marie Parfaite exerce comme activité, la vente de chaussures par le système de distribution ; ce qui lui permet de répondre sans grande difficulté aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Dans le souci de renforcer davantage son activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Marie Parfaite désire augmenter le stock de ses produits. Pour ce faire, Marie Parfaite sollicite ensemble avec le second membre du groupe OGNATAN, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The Ognatan group is made up of two people who are friends. The representative of this group, named Marie Parfaite, is the one whose hand is raised in the photo. This is the second time that this group has asked for financial support from Alidé to see an increase in their level of business. 

Marie Parfaite is 54 years old and no longer lives with her husband. She has two children, both of whom are under her care. One goes to school. Marie Parfaite lives alone with her children, and she alone takes care of their needs. Marie Parfaite did not go to school.

For about 15 years now Marie Parfaite has been selling shoes by the distribution system. This allows her to meet her and her children's needs without much difficulty. In hopes of further strengthening her business and better responding to the demands of her customers, Marie Parfaite wants to increase the stock of her products. To do this, Marie Parfaite, with the other member of group Ognatan, is asking for a second loan through Alidé. Their first loan has been repaid.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Gantsetseg

texts.en:
Gantsetseg is a 35-year-old woman who lives with her husband and two children in a little house in the Sukhbaatar district of Ulaanbaatar city. Her husband works in the hotel as warehouse keeper. Her son is a secondary school student and her daughter goes to the kindergarten. 

She has been working as assistant in a clothes retailing business of others since 2010. She has gained customers' trust and built closer relationships with suppliers, and now she is planning to open her own cosmetics and other goods retail business. She will import goods from the U.S. 

Gantsetseg is well experienced in the clothes, cosmetics and other items retailing sector. She is asking 1,200,000 MNT to purchase various goods from the U.S.

loans.use: To purchase various goods from the U.S. to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria works hard to support her two children. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Gloria has requested a PHP 7,500 loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp.

She would like to buy a solar lamp because she wants to save money by minimizing her kerosene expenses.

Gloria is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment and reducing health risks for her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Minda

texts.en:
Minda is 57 years old and lives in Dolores, Clarin. She is widowed with two children. 

Minda has a store that sells a variety of products. She has had this business for 10 years.

Minda has requested a loan to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

Minda has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Minda hopes to save money in case of emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more spices and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en:
Phuong is a 39-year-old married man. He lives with his children and wife in Ho Chi Minh City. He and his wife earn money through their food stall, where they sell sweets to people in their community. 

Phuong would like a loan to purchase equipment and good quality ingredients to make sweets. He hopes this will enable him to better meet the needs of his customers and attract additional customers. He also hopes that through his loan, he will be able to increase his income and save money for any future difficulties facing his family.

loans.use: to purchase equipment and good quality ingredients to make sweets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
This is Rosa. She previously accessed a 12,000 PHP loan that she used to buy garlic, black pepper and other stock for her repacking business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

Rosa would like to apply for another 11,000 PHP loan so she can buy garlic, black pepper and other stock for her repacking business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Rosa hopes to be able to expand soon and dreams of giving her children a good and quality education. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group comprises 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stock of herbs and spice products that she needs for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more meat to resell.

loans.name: Casilda

texts.es:
Casilda, de 56 años es una mujer alegre, vive en compañía de su esposo Antonio y sus 4 hijos a los que cuida en la casa que adquirieron hace 20 años, por la empresa donde trabajaban. Hace 20 años, una empresa del estado les enseñó todo lo necesario de la ganadería y agricultura. Desde ese entonces comenzó a criar vacas y camélidos. En la actualidad posee 8 vacas, ovejas y llamas. Los cuales cuida con mucho esmero y dedicación, “paso la mayor parte del tiempo en pastar a mis animales en las alturas, donde comen pastos naturales, por esa razón son de buena calidad”, afirma. Todos los días realiza queso, gracias a la leche que producen los animales. Comenta que la otra actividad económica que desarrolla es la agricultura pero en menor cantidad, pues en la crianza de animales es donde obtiene mayores ganancias. Este es el crédito número 17 con MFP, en todo este tiempo demostró ser puntual y responsable sobre todo gusta de pertenecer a su asociación “virgen de Fátima”,  que lo conforman personas solidarias y con espíritu emprendedor.
Casilda, invertirá el dinero en la compra de 2 vacas de raza y si el dinero le alcanza comprará también ovejas.
texts.en: Casilda is a happy, 56 year old woman. She lives with her husband, Antonio, and their four children, whom she takes care of in the house they got 20 years ago by the business where they worked. Twenty years ago a state company taught them everything they needed to know about livestock and agriculture. Ever since that time she started to raise cows and camelids. She currently has eight cows, sheep, and llamas. She takes care of them with much care and dedication. “I spend most of my time grazing my animals in the highland where they eat natural grass, which is the reason they are good quality,” she affirms. She makes cheese every day thanks to the milk the animals produce. She comments that the other business activity she does is farming, but in smaller quantity. Raising animals is where she gets greater income. This is her 17th loan with MFP. In all of this time she has shown herself to be punctual and responsible. Above all, she likes belonging to her communal bank, Virgen de Fátima. The bank is comprised of supportive people with the entrepreneurial spirit. Casilda will use the money to buy two purebred cows. If there is enough money, she will also buy sheep.

loans.use: to buy two purebred cows and sheep.

loans.name: Ngoc

texts.en:
Ngoc is 43 years old and is married. She lives with her husband in Ho Chi Minh City.

Her husband earns money by working as a carpenter. Ngoc earns an income to support her family running a business of selling wood products. She intends to use her loan to invest in her factory by buying a greater quantity and a variety of wood materials for making wooden furniture and wooden products to sell from her store.

Ngoc hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and save money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity and a variety of wood materials for making wood furniture and wood products.

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana is 41 years old and lives in Dela Paz, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 6 children.
Juana works in the fish industry and sells fish for a living. She has been doing this for 1 year. She has requested a loan for additional capital.
Juana has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Juana hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy boxes of fishes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Gulrukhsor

texts.ru: Гулрухсор жительница города Истаравшан. Она замужем. Ей 25 лет. У нее двое детей. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. Образование у Гулрухсор среднее. Она занимается животноводством. В этой области Гулрухсор шесть лет. Она берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Gulrukhsor lives in Istaravshan. She is 25 years old, married, and has two children. Her husband is currently in the Russian Federation. Gulrukhsor has a high school education and has been working in animal husbandry for the last 6 years. She is seeking a loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks.

loans.name: Jonnebert

texts.en:
Jonnebert is 23 years old, single and lives in Toril, Aloran, Misamis Occidental.
Jonnebert makes furniture to earn a living and has had this business for 2 years. Each month, he earns PHP 6,000 doing this type of work. He has requested a loan for PHP 12,000 to purchase a spray gun, a compressor, and wood.
Jonnebert has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Jonnebert hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase a spray gun, a compressor, and wood.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Lyne

texts.en:
Lyne is married with 5 children. Lyne is 36 years old and lives in Poblacion, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.
Lyne sells ready-to-wear products (RTW's) to earn a living. She has had this business for 12 years. Each month, she earns PHP 4,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 9,000 to purchase more dresses to sell. 
Lyne has been a member of PMPC this year 2012. In the future, Lyne hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more dresses to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Emma Peregrina

texts.en:
Emma Peregrina is a 56-year-old married woman with six children from Baclayon, Bohol. She has been in the sari-sari (variety) store business for 30 years. She sells items like soft drinks like Coke and Pepsi, rice, canned goods, soap, coffee and toiletries.

She plans to use the loan to buy additional merchandise like soft drinks, canned goods, coffee and toiletries. In the future, she would like to expand her business to be successful and at the same time to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like soft drinks, rice, canned goods and soap.

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.ru: Людмила использовала предыдущий кредит для расширения ассортимента. За счет дополнительной прибыли было закуплено оборудование для отопления квартиры. В этот раз Людмила просит предоставить ей кредит для приобретения женской сезонной одежды. Она надеется получить прибыль и улучшить быт своей семьи.
texts.en: Ludmila used her previous loan to expand the range of goods she sells. With the extra income generated by that loan, Ludmila was able to buy a heating system for her apartment. This time Ludmila is seeking a loan to buy women's seasonal clothing. She hopes to make more profit and improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to buy women's seasonal clothing

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
This is LIlian. She previously accessed a 16,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase quantities of raw materials like fabric, thread, and other materials needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 25,000 PHP loan to buy additional supplies of raw materials needed in her business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her sustain her daily needs and pay the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Lilian hopes her business grows and she dreams of being able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work in her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for fabric, thread, and other items needed in her business.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer is married and has 2 children. Jennifer is 40 years old and resides at Panay Diot, Tudela. Jennifer plants and harvests rice to earn a living. She has been in this business for six years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase fertilizers such as manure. Jennifer joined GDMPC in 2011. In the future, Jennifer wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Rosalino

texts.en: Rosalino, 50 years old, is a married entrepreneur who lives in Bagakay, Ozamis City. He has 4 children and earns an income from his transport business. He started the business almost 5 years ago and he earn PHP 5,000 per month. To improve business, he borrowed PHP 20,000 from GDMPC Micro Credit, which he just joined recently to obtain accessories and tires and pay for motorcycle registration. Before long, he hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to obtain accessories and tires and pay for motorcycle registration.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her agriculture business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Nao

texts.en: Nao is requesting a new loan to buy good quality food ingredients for her food stall. This purchase will help her to better attract and satisfy her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her food stall and increasing sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy good quality ingredients to cook better food to sell.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en:
Juanita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store for her general store business.

NWTF is re-listing Juanita's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.en:
Filiciana is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more stock to sell at her store.

NWTF is re-listing Filiciana's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more store stock to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Rosary

texts.en: Rosary is married with 2 dependents. She is 33 years old and lives in Carmen Annex, Osamiz City. Rosary owns and operates a motorcycle transport service business. She established the motorcycle transport business as a way of generating extra income and now makes PHP 8,000 per month. She has engaged in this type of service for 5 years. Rosary requested a loan of PHP 20,000 from GDMPC. She intends to use the money from the loan to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories. Rosary has been a member of GDMPC since 2010. In the future, Rosary wants to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle spare parts and accessories.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 45 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de su esposo Juvenal y sus 5 hijos. A los que cuida en la casa que compró hace 20 años. Gracias a la ayuda del estado peruano, aprendió todo lo necesario de la ganadería. En la actualidad es su principal actividad económica. Posee 5 vacas y 14 ovejas de las cuales cuida con mucho esmero y empeño, pues diariamente elabora queso, con la leche que producen. Según cuenta vende a buen precio y obtiene buenas ganancias con lo que solventa la economía de su hogar. Ahora desea seguir con el mejoramiento de sus animales, pues su secreto se centra en alimentarlos con pasto natural  y comida concentrada. Este es el crédito número 17 con MFP, en todo este tiempo demostró ser puntual y responsable sobre todo gusta de pertenecer a su asociación “virgen de Fátima”,  que lo conforman personas solidarias y con espíritu emprendedor. Carmen, invertirá el dinero en la compra de ovejas, para aumentar su ganado
texts.en: Carmen, 45, is a simple woman. She lives with her husband Juvenal and their 5 children, whom they care for in the house they bought 20 years ago. Thanks to help from the Peruvian state, she learned everything she needed about livestock. It’s currently her principal economic activity. She owns 5 cows and 14 sheep and takes care of them with great attention and determination. Every day she makes cheese from the milk they produce. According to her, she sells at a good price and makes enough income to support her household. Now she’d like to continue improving her care of the animals and with her secret, which is to feed them real grass and animal food. This is her 17th loan with MFP and in all of this time she has shown herself to be punctual and responsible. She enjoys being a member of the “Virgen de Fatima” (Virgin of Fatima) association, which comprises supportive people with entrepreneurial spirit. Carmen will invest her loan in buying sheep to increase her flock.

loans.use: buy sheep

loans.name: Cruz Del Norte Group

texts.es:
Paola Milagros tiene 25 años de edad, es soletra y tiene un hijo pequeño de 3 meses.  Paola Milagros es socia del grupo "Cruz del Norte", recientemente formado por 5 socios, todos con pequeños negocios pero con muchas ganas de crecer y llegar a ser grandes comerciantes.
Paola Milagros, se dedica a la venta de ropa, desde hace tres años. Ella ofrece sus prendas de vestir a sus familiares y amigos y ellos la recomiendan con otros clientes, paralelamente a éste negocio por el día vende menú en su domicilio. Le gustaría tener un pequeño bazar para lo cual trabaja mucho para juntar su capital y alquilar un stand ya sea en un mercado o alquilar un local en una zona comercial.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para iniciar su campaña navideña con anticipación.
Paola Milagros se encuentra al lado derecho de la fotografía, alzando su mano izquierda.
texts.en:
Paola Milagros, 26, is single and has a three-month-old child.  She's a member of Cruz del Norte Group, recently formed by five members, all with small businesses but with a great desire to grow and become great shopkeepers.

Paola Milagros has made a living selling clothing for three years.  She sells her clothing to family members and friends, and they recommend her to other customers.  In addition to this business she sells food in her home during the day.  She would like to have a little stall, for which she works a lot.

She's going to invest the loan in buying clothing to start the Christmas season early.

Paola Milagros is located at the right in the photograph, raising her left hand.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina is a 38-year-old married mother of two children and lives in Capucao, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. For over five years, Felomina has made a living by running a general store that sells a variety of food and home-use products. She earns 5,000 PHP a month from her business.
In 2007, Felomina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 13,500 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy tools for repairing electrical items.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Toda persona tiene la oportunidad de reiniciarse, superarse y encontrar un camino que lo lleve al éxito, esta joven esta buscando la mejor opción que le permita encontrar un futuro mas próspero alejado de la delincuencia, vive junto a su familia que es su apoyo mas grande, a sus veinte años de edad ha comenzado un negocio que le ayuda con los gastos de su hogar, se dedica a la venta de tortillas pues es muy rentable y tiene experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los precios accesibles y por el servicio mas rápido; es una mujer dedicada a su labor, emprendedora y muy luchadora, día a día se esfuerza en el trabajo porque sabe que así obtendrá lo que tanto desea, esta muy contenta y tranquila con su negocio y en estas ultimas semanas que aumento la demanda, se decidió a realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su grupo familiar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Everybody has the chance to begin again, get ahead and find a road to success. This young woman is seeking the best option to allow her to find a more prosperous future away from crime. She lives with her family, who are her biggest support. At twenty years old, she has started a business to help with the household expenses. She sells tortillas, which is very profitable. She has experience, which allows her to obatin the most earnings. She has gained many customers who prefer her for her quality, accessible prices and quick service. She is dedicated to her work, and is enterprising and a fighter. She works hard day to day at her job because she knows that this way she will get what she wants the most. She is happy and at ease with her business and in these last few weeks demand has increased and she has decided to make an investment, but she doesn't have enough capital to back her up. That is why she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy corn wholesale and firewood. She has good credit references and is very responsible. She is committed to paying off the debt and is also confident that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale and firewood.

loans.name: Sorena

texts.en:
This is Sorena. She previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to buy more quantities of products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments, and seasonings. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in her family's personal, household, and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 8,000 PHP loan to purchase raw ingredients and supplies needed in her business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her sustain her daily needs and pay for the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Sorena hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving her family a good future through all her hard work. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week. She also meets to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God her group studies.

 * All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw ingredients and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 52 years old and lives in Malintuboan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 5 children.
Elsie has a sari-sari store and sells fish and earns approximately PHP 4,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for additional capital. Elsie joined PMPC in 2012. In the future, Elsie hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries and fish to sell/retail.

loans.name: Priscilla

texts.en:
Priscilla now is 41 years of age. She used her previous loan to purchase food for the new cafeteria business, which has since been picking up well.

She has requested a second loan of KES 60,000 from KADET LTD, to buy a microwave oven and a refrigerator for use in her cafeteria business,

The profit she earns will help her pay school fees for her two children. She hopes to grow her business and open up a big hotel in Eldoret town in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a microwave oven and a refrigerator for use in her business.

loans.name: Tuoi

texts.en:
Tuoi is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increasing sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en: Huong is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as confectioneries, instant food and basic household items to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of products such as instant food, confectioneries and basic household items.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de salir adelante pese a vivir en medio de delincuencia y violencia social es lo que ánima a este joven que convive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, y se dedica a trabajar en su molino, procesando todo tipo de alimentos, como maiz, frijoles, hárinas, salsas, entre otros. Tiene ya algún tiempo con el negocio y posee amplia experiencia que le ayuda a generar muy buenas ganancias, es muy conocido por las personas de la localidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, por los precios accesibles y por el servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor y muy decidido a luchar por sus sueños, esta trabajando muy duro todos los días para no decepcionar a su familia, se siente satisfecho y muy cómodo con su negocio, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda por el servicio y sus dos molinos ya no le dan abasto por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar un molino nuevo de trabajo. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevará seguridad económica y emocional a su familia.
texts.en:
The desire to get ahead despite living in the middle of crime and social violence is what motives this young man who lives together with his family in their own home.  He earns a living working with his mill, processing all types of food, such as corn, beans, flour and sauces, among others.  He has had this business for some time now and he has ample experience, which helps him to earn good profits.  He is well known among the people in his town and he has gained a lot of customers who prefer him for the quality, affordable prices, and unrivaled service.  

He is an entrepreneurial man who is always at the service of his customers.  He is dedicated to his work and he is very determined to fight for his dreams.  He is working very hard every day in order to not let his family down.  He feels satisfied and very comfortable with his business. 

In the last few weeks, the demand for his service has increased and his two mills are not providing enough supply so he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow him to buy a new mill.  He has good payment references and is responsible.  He promises to repay the debt and at the same time, he has faith that he will bring economic and emotional security to his family.

loans.use: to buy a new working mill.

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh, a 42-year-old married woman, lives in Ho Chi Minh City with 2 children. Her husband supports his family by working as a silversmith. Anh runs a business that sells a variety of basic goods to people in the local community.

Anh requests a loan to purchase more products  to stock her store, such as many kinds of sauce, snack foods, washing powder, and shampoos. That will enable her to offer a better range of products to her customers. She hopes her business will run smoothly and she can earn additional income to re-invest in her shop and save for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase more products to stock her store, such as many kinds of sauce, snack foods, washing powder, and shampoos.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Querer ganarse un futuro mejor con su propio esfuerzo y vivir alejado de la delincuencia y pobreza es el principal propósito de éste hombre, habita junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia y se dedica a la venta de minutas en los diferentes alrededores de la localidad donde vive, tiene una valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le ayuda a generar muy buenas ganancias, es muy conocido por las personas de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, por los precios accesibles y por el servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes, es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor y muy decidido a luchar por sus sueños, esta trabajando duro todos los días para no decepcionar a su familia, se siente feliz y muy tranquilo con su negocio, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para invertir, pero no posee de suficiente capital que lo respalde por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hielo por mayor, frutas, saborizantes y además darle mantenimiento al carrito ambulante de venta. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Wanting to earn a better future with his own effort and living far from crime and poverty is the main purpose of this man.  He lives together with his family in their own home and he earns a living selling shaved ice snacks en different neighborhoods in the town where he lives.  He has valuable experience in sales, which helps him generate very good profits.  He is well known among the people in his town and he has gained a lot of customers who prefer him for the quality, affordable prices, and unrivaled service.  

He is an entrepreneurial man who is always at the service of his customers.  He is dedicated to his work and he is very determined to fight for his dreams.  He is working very hard every day in order to not let his family down.  He feels happy and very comfortable with his business. 

In the last few weeks, the demand has increased and he wants to take advantage to invest, but he does not have sufficient capital so he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow him to buy ice in bulk, fruit, and flavorings as well as to maintain the push cart from which he sells.  He has good payment references and is responsible.  He promises to repay the debt in the established period and, at the same time, he is hopeful that he will bring economic security to his home.

loans.use: to buy ice in bulk, fruits and flavorings and to maintain his push cart.

loans.name: Guillermina Celena

texts.es:
Guillermina, desea invertir más en su negocio, solicita un préstamo que le ayudara en la compra de lubricantes para vehículos, así mejorar su atención a los clientes fortaleciendo el inventario para tener mas disponibilidad acorde a las necesidades.
Ella manifiesta que gracias al préstamo anterior pudo crecer y tener todo lo necesario para atender de una mejor forma a los clientes, ella sigue con su negocio y en su familia la situación a mejorado, tienen una mejor vida que antes.
texts.en:
Guillermina would like to invest more in her business. She is requesting a loan to help her buy lubricants for vehicles. This way she can improve her customer service by stocking up on inventory in order to have more available according to her needs. 
She is thankful for the previous loan as it helped her grow her business and have everything she needed to attend to her clients better. She continues with her business. Her situation at home with her family has improved as they have a better life than before.

loans.use: buy lubricants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy phone cards, sim cards and chargers

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Esta joven mujer esta empezando un negocio de venta de artículos para costurera, como tela, adornos, listones, flores, entre otros, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y dejar su vida pasada, que era rodeada de mucha violencia social, es una de las mejores y mas grandes decisiones que ha tomado y su grupo familiar esta dispuesto a darle su apoyo, comercia desde un local del mercado de la localidad donde vive, ha adquirido experiencia en las ventas y eso le permite obtener buenas ganancias, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, los precios accesibles y el excelente servicio; es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, luchadora y con muchas metas que desea lograr, ha identificado que posee muchas habilidades importantes para sacar adelante éste reinicio, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas próspero, se siente muy contenta con el negocio, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela, adornos, listones, flores. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para todos.
texts.en:
This young woman is starting a business selling sewing materials, such as fabric, adornments, ribbon and flowers among other things.  She wants to have a new start and leave behind her past life which was surrounded by a lot of social violence.  It is one of the best and biggest decisions she has made and her family is ready to give her their support.  She sells from a shop in the market of the town where she lives.  She has acquired sales experience and that allows her to make a good profit.  She has gained a lot of customers because the people prefer her for the quality, affordable prices, and excellent service.  

She is an active, entrepreneurial and determined woman who is dedicated to her work and she has a lot of goals she wishes to accomplish.  She has identified that she possesses a lot of important skills to make this restart successful.  She is working hard to achieve a prosperous future.  She feels happy with the business. 

In the last few weeks, demand has increased so she wants to make a new investment.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy fabric, adornments, ribbon and flowers.  The young woman has good payment references and is responsible.  She promises to pay the debt and at the same time, she has the hope that she will bring economic security and a better quality of life for everyone in her home.

loans.use: to buy fabric, adornments, ribbon and flowers.

loans.name: Ma'rifat

texts.ru: Маърифат жительница города Истаравшан. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. Сама Маърифат на протяжении одиннадцати лет занимается торговлей на рынке. Она в основном занимается оптовой продажей детской одежды. У Маърифат мужественный характер, она ответственный человек. Маърифат уже несколько лет как одна обеспечивает семью. Она берет кредит для покупки детской и подростковой зимней одежды, а также для приобретения вязанных жакетов и носков.
texts.en: Ma'rifat lives in Istaravshan. She is 46 years old, married, and has two children. Her husband is currently in the Russian Federation. For the last eleven years, Ma'rifat has been working in retail at the market. She mainly sells children's clothing. Ma'rifat has a strong character and is a responsible woman. For the past several years, she has been the sole provider for her family. Ma'rifat is seeking a loan to buy winter clothes for children and teenagers, as well as knitted jackets and socks.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes for children and teenagers, and knitted jackets and socks

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is married with six children. Virginia is 54 years old and lives in Talic, Oroquieta City.
Virginia buys and sells fruit to earn a living and has had this business for 2 years. Each month, she earns PHP 3,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to purchase a variety of fruits such as bananas, watermelons, etc. 
Virginia has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Virginia hopes to have more savings.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fruits such as bananas, watermelons, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of fish to re-sell.

loans.name: Linh

texts.en:
Linh, a 39-year-old mother of two, lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns a living working as a taxi driver. Linh supports her family by running a business selling votive products. She began ten years ago. 

Linh requires a loan to purchase larger quantities of votive products such as incense and many kinds of worship objects to sell. She hopes that her business runs smoothly and enables her to improve her family's income and living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase larger quantities of votive products such as incense to sell.

loans.name: Genaro

texts.en:
Genaro is 59 years old and lives in Matugas Bajo, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is widowed with 4 children. 
Genaro is engaged as a single motor for hire and earns approximately PHP 2,500 each month doing this type of work. He has a requested a loan to pay registration renewal fees and insurance on his motorcycle.
Genaro has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Genaro hopes to purchase another motorcycle.

loans.use: to pay registration renewal fees and insurance on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Vive en una localidad con alta violencia social y espera cambiar esta realidad para sus hijos en un futuro cercano, y así ellos no sufran la influencia de la delincuencia, por ello se levanta cada día para brindarle lo mejor de ella, es muy conocida en la zona de residencia por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad, es muy trabajadora y muy amable a la hora de vender es por eso que posee de clientes que la llegan a buscar y prefieren sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así lograr su sueño que es comprar mas productos como huevos, leche, harinas, arroz, frijol, crema entre otros. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada será dada y no tendrá mas preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en: This borrower lives in an area with high levels of social violence and she hopes to change this reality for her children in the near future, so that they don't suffer from the influence of crime.  To this end, she gets up everyday in order to offer them the best she has.  She is very well-known in her neighborhood for her humility and her dedication to her work.  She has never stopped striving and she has always overcome her difficulties.  With effort and dedication, she runs a store where she sells staple goods.  She is very hard-working and kind and that is why she has customers who frequent her store and prefer her products.  She has noticed the necessity of stocking more products in her store but she doesn't have the capital to do it.  For this reason, she approached INTEGRAL to request a loan and thus, reach her goal which is to purchase more products such as eggs, milk, flour, rice, beans, cream and others.  She trusts in God that soon the help she has requested will be given and that she will not have to worry so much about providing the daily needs of her household.

loans.use: to purchase more products like eggs, milk, flour, rice, beans, cream and others.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre hay momentos duros y difíciles pero el deseo de superación siempre se nos presenta en la vida. Esta cliente es un claro ejemplo de ello; vive junto a su compañero de vida y junto a él tienen el mejor deseo de salir adelante y nunca dejarse vencer por las adversidades de la vida, aún rodeados de una fuerte violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en la que viven. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y honesta con buenas relaciones en el lugar de residencia. Ella se dedica a vender perfumes en su hogar poco a poco se ha hecho de clientes que la prefieren y es por eso que desea comprar mas perfumes, tener variedad y no los mismo. Lamentablemente no tiene el capital suficiente para esta inversión, es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL para la compra de esta materia prima y así darle variedad a sus clientes que tanto la prefieren. Agradece la ayuda que espera recibir y así estar segura que sus ventas crecerán un poco mas
texts.en: There are always difficult moments, but life always gives us opportunities for hope. This client is a clear example of this; she lives with her partner and together they have a strong desire to improve their lives. Although they are surrounded by a high level of violence in their neighborhood, they do not give up in the face of adversity. She is a hardworking and honest woman with good relationships with the people around her. She works selling perfumes out of her home and little by little she has developed a clientele. She wishes to buy more variety and not offer the same products as others. Unfortunately, she does not have the necessary capital for such an investment. This is why she came to INTEGRAL, so she could purchase these products and thus give her clients the variety they want. She is thankful for the support that she hopes to receive, and she is sure her sales will increase a little more.

loans.use: purchase perfumes

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia en una zona de alta incidencia de violencia social y delincuencia, desea no verse afectada por ella, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, chocobananos, charamuscas congeladas de diferentes sabores, comercia desde su hogar y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio mas rápido, es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero. Se siente muy contenta con el negocio pero sabe que necesita hacerlo crecer a fin de salir de la pobreza, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda, por lo que quiere realizar una mayor inversión en la compra de los insumos necesarios para realizar sus productos, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, frutas, chocolate, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The desire to make something of herself is one of the most important dreams of a woman who lives in her own home with her family in an area with a high incidence of crime and social violence. She does not want to be affected by it, and her devotion to her profession has been one of the best decisions she has made.  She is proud of it. She sells tortillas, chocolate-covered bananas, and frozen popsicles of a variety of flavors.  She does business from home and already has many customers that prefer the quality of her products, her affordable prices, and most of all that she provides the fastest service.  She is an active, enterprising woman, who is dedicated to her work, and has many goals she wants to achieve.  She works very hard to achieve a more prosperous future. She is very happy with her business but knows she needs to make it grow so that she can emerge out of poverty.  In recent weeks the demand of her products has increased, so she wants to make a greater investment in the purchase of inputs needed to make her products.  For that reason she requests a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy wholesale corn, fruit, chocolate, etc.  She has good payment references and is very responsible.  She ensures that she will repay the debt and at the same time hopes to bring economic security to her household.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn, fruit, small bananas, and chocolate

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una joven mujer de veinticinco años de edad que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, entre otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, la tienda es muy conocida  por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejada de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar  una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas, etc. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The desire to overcome and suceed is one of the dreams of this young 25-year old woman who lives with her family. She has a shop where they sell staple goods like basic grains, milk, and eggs. She has been running the business for a while and this experience has allowed her to improve her earnings. The shop is well-known in the neighborhood, and it has a clientele that likes the quality products, good prices, and excelent service. The owner is a hardworker and is dedicated to working every day to build a better future away from the violence of the neighborhood where she resides. She does her best every day because she is happy with her work, and she does not want to disappoint her family. In the last few weeks demand has been going up, and she needs to invest more. This is way she applied for a loan with INTEGRAL to buy basic grains, instant food products, snacks, bread, and drinks. This young woman has a good credit history and is very responsible. She is sure that she can pay off the debt and hopefully bring economic security to her small household.

loans.use: purchase basic grains, snacks, bread, drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
