CONSUELO ALEJANDRINA  Se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, insecticidas, ranger, abono orgánico, pollos.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá  tener más ingresos. El sueño es  seguir trabajando e invertir para obtener ganancia de los productos.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar pelota.
texts.en:
Consuela Alejandrina is 34 years old, single and has three children. She lives with them in the city of Ventanas in De Los Rios province. She is a member of the San Francisco communal bank, located in the rural settlement of Pantano, which is part of Ventanas canton. People in this area make their living from farming and livestock-raising. 

Consuelo Alejandrina is a farmer and grows corn. She also raises chickens and pigs. She is applying for the loan in order to buy seeds, urea fertilizer, insecticides, herbicide, manure and chickens.

With the help of the loan she will be able to have more income. Her dream is to keep working and investing so that she can earn a profit from her crops. The challenges she faces are pests and crop diseases. In her free time she likes to play soccer.

loans.use: To buy seeds, urea fertilizer, insecticides, herbicide, manure, and chickens.

loans.name: Zaur

texts.en:
Zaur is a 33-year-old, married man. He has two children in his care.

Zaur grew up in a peasant family, where he was exposed to the agricultural industry. To earn a living, he has been breeding cattle for over six years. He sells milk/dairy products, and he has many customers in the region where he lives.

Zaur would like to further expand his business and will work hard to realize his goals. He is seeking to buy his own house, but he lacks 1,500 AZN to do so, which is why he is applying for this loan. Zaur is counting on your kindness and understanding.

loans.use: To purchase his own house.

loans.name: İlham

texts.en:
İlham is a 42-year-old, married father of two children.

He has been working in auto repair for 20 years. He opened his own workshop to improve his living conditions and to increase his income. He is also engaged in the agriculture business, including soil tillage and animal husbandry.

İlham is applying for a loan to increase his inventory of spare parts for cars and of oil for his machinery and tools. İlham is experienced in this field and is able to attract new customers and to increase his income. He is looking forward to further expanding his business and improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase additional spare parts for cars and oil for tools.

loans.name: Zaid

texts.en: Zaid is a 55-year-old married man who is a father of seven sons and daughters. After his retirement, Zaid opened a mini-market that serves the area of Al Karak in southern Jordan. He has now applied for this loan to increase his profits by bringing more food products to the store that are requested by the neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy more food products for the store

loans.name: Hala

texts.en: Hala, a mother of three kids, is married to a taxi driver who does his best in putting food on the table every day. Hala, on the other hand, is trying to help her husband in paying the household bills by establishing a small home-based retail business selling house wares and kitchenware to neighbors and friends. Having no space and with the lack of funding, Hala sometimes goes to the market just to bring a specific order, so she has applied for this loan in order to increase the quantity and variety of products she has so that when a customer is asking for something it would be available at her house. She wants to make a special area as a small storage area until she finds a suitable one.

loans.use: to increase the quantity and variety of products

loans.name: Khitam

texts.en:
Khitam is a conservative woman, which is why she asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

Using the previous loan has helped her increase her productivity and profits. So far she has around 35 goats; she takes the milk and makes dairy products to sell. Now an Islamic holiday is coming up. In this holiday middle- and high- class people buy goats or cows and distribute most of the meat to the poor. For that Khitam is applying for this loan, to increase the number of goats to increase her profits during these holiday sales.

loans.use: to increase her number of goats

loans.name: Perfecta Teresa

texts.es:
PERFECTA TERESA tiene 53 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos, vive con los familiares en la ciudad de ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC SAN FRANCISCO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas y Pecuarias.

PERFECTA TERESA  Se dedica a la agricultura, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, semillas, urea, insecticidas, ranger, abono orgánico.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para los cultivos. El sueño es  seguir trabajando e invertir para obtener ganancia de los productos.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas en las cosechas . En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Perfecta Teresa, 53, is single and has no children; she lives with family members in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.  She’s a member of the “San Francisco” communal bank located in Recinto Pantano belonging to Ventanas Canton; they are in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Perfecta Teresa works in agriculture and also raises chickens and pigs.  She’s requesting the loan to buy chicks, urea, insecticide, Ranger [herbicide], organic manure and seeds.  With help from the loan she will be able to buy what’s needed for the crops.  

Her dream is to continue working and investing to obtain profits from his products.  The challenge she faces is crop infestations.  In her free time she enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: to buy chicks, seeds, urea, insecticide, Ranger and organic manure.

loans.name: Alejandro David

texts.es:
ALEJANDRO DAVID tiene 28 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo vive con los padres y el padre en la ciudad de Ventanas provivncia de los ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC SAN FRANCISCO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas y Pecuarias.

 ALEJANDRO DAVID  Se dedica a la agricultura a la siemra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar cerdos, pollos, polbillo, balanceado, semillas.  Con la ayuda del crédito podrá  tener más ingresos. Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es  seguir trabajando e invertir para obtener ganancia de los productos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y las enfermedades en los cultivos. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli y futbol.
texts.en:
Alejandro David, 28, is single and has a son; he lives with him and his parents in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.  He’s a member of the “San Francisco” communal bank located in Recinto Pantano belonging to Ventanas Canton; they are in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Alejandro David works in agriculture growing corn and rice and also raises chickens and pigs.  He’s requesting the loan to buy pigs, chicks, animal feed and seeds.  With help from the loan he will be able to earn more income.  He will make his purchases in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to continue working and investing to obtain profits from his products.  The challenge he faces is crop infestations and illnesses.  In his free time he enjoys playing volleyball and soccer.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chicks, animal feed and seeds.

loans.name: Clara Janeth

texts.es:
CLARA JANETH tiene 39 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene 2 hijos, vive con los hijos en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC SAN FRANCISCO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas y Pecuarias.

CLARA JANETH Se dedica a la agricultura, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas,pollos, urea, insecticidas, ranger, abono orgánico.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá  tener más ingresos. El sueño es  seguir trabajando e invertir para obtener ganancia de los productos.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas en las cosechas . En el tiempo libre le gusta alimentar a las aves.
texts.en:
Clara Janeth is 39 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. She lives with her children in the city of Ventanas in De Los Rios province. She is a member of the San Francisco communal bank, located in the rural settlement of Pantano, which is part of Ventanas canton. People in this area make their living from farming and livestock-raising.

Clara Janeth is a farmer and also raises chickens and pigs. She is applying for the loan in order to buy seeds, chickens, urea fertilizer, insecticides, herbicide, and manure.

With the help of the loan she will be able to have more income. Her dream is to keep working and investing so that she can earn a profit from her crops. The challenges she faces are crop pests. In her free time, she likes to feed the birds.

loans.use: To buy seeds, chickens, urea fertilizer, insecticides, herbicide, and manure.

loans.name: Blessing Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you members of the “Blessing I” group. These are small-scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of 800,000 SLL each in order to invest in their respective businesses. 

Hannah is the leader of this group. Hannah is married with six children – three in primary school, two in secondary school, and one in college. Hannah sells market food – cooking oil, margi (used to give sauce a sweet taste), salt, pepper, etc. She has been doing this business for many years now. With the help of this loan, Hannah will invest in her business by buying the above-mentioned items in large quantity to add to her current ones. 

(Also included in the left of the photo is loan officer Edward posing with the borrowers.)

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, margi, salt, pepper, etc., to add to her business inventory

loans.name: Jonathan Daniel

texts.es:
JONATHAN DANIEL tiene 23 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo vive con el en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC SAN FRANCISCO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas y Pecuarias.

JONATHAN DANIEL  Se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos.
Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, semillas, urea, insecticidas, ranger, abono orgánico.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario en la agricultura. El sueño es  seguir trabajando e invertir para obtener ganancia de los productos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas en las cosechas . En el tiempo libre le gusta estar con la familia y jugar indor.
texts.en:
Jonathan Daniel is 23 years old, single, and has a son. He lives with him in the city of Ventanas, in De Los Rios province. He is a member of the "San Francisco" communal bank, located in the rural settlement of Pantano, which is part of Ventanas canton. People in this area make their living from farming and livestock-raising.

Jonathan Daniel is a farmer and grows corn. He also raises chickens and pigs. He is applying for the loan in order to buy chickens, seeds, urea fertilizer, insecticides, herbicide, and manure.

With the help of the loan he will be able to buy what he needs in his farming. His dream is to keep working and investing so that he can earn a profit from his crops. The challenges he faces are crop pests. In his free time, he likes to be with family, and play indoor soccer.

loans.use: To buy chickens, seeds, urea fertilizer, insecticides, herbicide, and manure.

loans.name: Taha

texts.en: Taha, a 49-year-old married man, is a father of four. Taha has a 5-year-old business. He is applying for this loan to get more wood so he can expand the business of selling wood. He also has some lifting equipment that is for rent.

loans.use: to get more wood

loans.name: Khawla

texts.en: Khawla is a 45-year-old mother of five. Her husband is serving in the military, while she is trying to help to improve their living conditions with the income she makes out of her home-based beauty salon. It has been five years since she started the business. Now she has applied to this loan to bring new tools and hair accessories.

loans.use: to buy new tools and hair accessories.

loans.name: Sanaa

texts.en: Sanaa is a 48-year-old widow living with her daughter. After her husband's death, Sanaa started making home accessories and decoration pieces to sell at home so she can support herself and her daughter. Now Sanaa has applied for this loan to buy more raw material that she can use in making new collections to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy more raw material

loans.name: Lidia Liliana

texts.es: Lidia tiene 22 años de edad, es casada, tiene un hijo, vive en Olanchito, Yoro. Ella tiene casi dos años de haber establecido su negocio de pulpería para dedicarse a vender productos de consumo diario como carnes, arroz, frijoles, harina, embutidos, lácteos, papel higiénico, productos enlatados, churros, condimentos, huevos, pan, dulces, granos básicos y otros abarrotes. Lidia ha solicitado este préstamo de 20,000 lempiras para surtir más el negocio de productos alimenticios y de un 10% del préstamo lo utilizara para hacer una reparación a su casa (repellar la pared de dos dormitorios). su meta es hacer crecer el negocio y tener el mejor negocio de su colonia donde vive, obtener más ganancias para sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Lidia, 22, is married and has a son; she lives in Olanchito, Yoro.  She’s had a grocery store for almost two years where she sells basic staples like meat, rice, beans, flour, canned goods, dairy products, toilet paper, cured meats, snacks, condiments, eggs, bread, candy, basic grains and other grocery items.  

Lidia has requested a 20,000 Lempira loan to better stock the store with food items and she’ll use 10% of the loan for home improvements (she will plaster the walls in two bedrooms).  Her goal is to make the business grow and to have the best store in her neighborhood, to earn more profits and to move her family forward and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store and to plaster the walls in two bedrooms at home.
